name: Sidekick Cycle
summary:
Sidekick Cycle is the most exhilarating “downhill” style gameplay experience ever for iOS. Use your skills to brave hazardous terrain, while heroically delivering bikes to kids in need.

Enhance your ride with an assortment of helpful Sidekicks, then push it to the breaking point as your hurtle at top speed through treacherous terrain filled with gravity-bending jumps and all that Mother Nature can throw at you!
